videos.description: Clemson takes advantage of UNC turnovers; hitting a three, a dunk, and a layup in a 7-0 Tiger run.
videos.headline: Crazy sequence allows Clemson to go on a 7-0 run against UNC

videos.description: A Justin Jackson jumper and Isaiah Hicks putback erase a deficit to tie Clemson at 28.
videos.headline: UNC's Jackson and Hicks tie the game at 28-28

videos.description: Clemson's Marcquise Reed drains a three pointer than Jaron Blossomgame dunks off of a UNC turnover and Clemson leads by 5 at the half.
videos.headline: Marcquise Reed and Jaron Blossomgame help Clemson head to the locker room leading UNC 43-38

videos.description: UNC's Joel Berry II buries a three and Clemson's Shelton Mitchell responds with a 3-pointer. North Carolina trying to score on the other end, but Clemson's Sidy Djitte swats a shot away.
videos.headline: UNC and Clemson locked in action-packed second half

videos.description: UNC's Joel Berry II knocks down a three giving him 26 points on the day, which gives him a new career high.
videos.headline: Joel Berry II has a career high in points for UNC

videos.description: Exciting ACC matchup continues to excite late in the second half.
videos.headline: Back and forth second half highlighted by a Berry II assist and layup by Clemson's Holmes

videos.description: Clemson's Marcquise Reed hits a three to tie the game, then Clemson is fouled with the game tied.
videos.headline: Clemson's Reed drills a three to tie the game

videos.description: Joel Berry II picks off the pass and gets it to Justin Jackson, who quickly passes back to Berry II for the lay-in.
videos.headline: Berry II getting it done with OT steal and lay-in

videos.description: Nate Britt misses his shot but Kennedy Meeks is there to put it back in plus the foul.
videos.headline: Meeks' extra effort leads to bucket in UNC's win

videos.description: Clemson coach Brad Brownell starts shouting at Roy Williams, and it appears that Williams is apologizing to him after North Carolina's overtime win.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Clemson coach gets heated with Roy Williams after loss) 2017/01/03

videos.headline: Clemson coach gets heated with Roy Williams after loss

videos.description: Joel Berry II scores 31 points as North Carolina overcomes a halftime deficit to defeat Clemson 89-86 in overtime.
videos.headline: North Carolina wins OT battle with Clemson
